name: St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph
comment:
346-bed hospital * services include long term care, outpatient services, complex medical, speech and language pathology, rehabilitation, clinics and medical services, palliative care
geriatric outreach services, community support services and seniors housing * various outpatient services across multiple locations

Services and Programs:
  • Acquired Brain Injury Day Program
  • Driving Rehabilitation Program
  • Musculoskeletal Rehabilitation
  • Physiotherapy Clinic
  • St Joseph's Health Centre - Overnight Stay Respite Program
  • St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph - Alzheimer’s Day Program
  • St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph - Long Term Care Home
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - Allan Reuter Centre
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - City of Waterloo - Adult Recreation Centre
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - East Wellington Community Services
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - Fergus Outreach Location
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - Guelph - Huron St
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - Guelph - Westmount St
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - KW Seniors Day Program
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - Mount Forest Outreach Location
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - Traverse Independence
  • Waterloo Wellington Regional Aphasia Program (WWRAP) - William E Paulter Centre
  • Young Onset Dementia Program (YODA)
